channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Administration Division: Roof Replacements Scheduled for Summer Months
item.description: All members of the campus community should note that roof replacements are scheduled for the Materials Research Center (MRC), Empire State Hall (ESH), and the west wing of the Jonsson Rowland Science Center (JRSC). Construction will begin on Monday, June 17 and be completed by Friday, August 9, with tentative daily work hours set for 6:00AM to 2:30PM, Monday through Friday.
item.author: Community

item.title: Don’t Miss the Troy Pride Festival!
item.description: Date: Sunday, July 14, 2024 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Come down to Riverfront Park for the Troy Pride performances, then stay to shop and peruse the 40 featured vendors, a majority of whom are based right in Rensselaer County and identify as LGBTQ+ owned and operated. The event will also offer yoga in the park, food trucks, and Collar City Pride merchandise, to be sure to stop by and join the fun!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Continue Graduate Certificate Review Sessions July 16
item.description: Date: Tuesday, July 16, 2024 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for this information session highlighting the whole range of Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Three courses in length and able to be completed in as little as seven months, the certificates can add up to a customized, career-aligned master’s degree. Please register if you plan to attend.
item.author: Community

item.title: Summer Outdoor Program Series Continues with Overnight Canoe Camping at Forked Lake
item.description: Date: Friday, July 19, 2024 3:00 PM - Sun , July 21, 2024 2:00 PM - Students are invited to join the Mueller Center’s overnight canoe camping trip at Forked Lake! This trip is limited to eight participants and registration is required; please look for information and registration on the Muller Center’s Instagram page, or contact WillWeinert if you have questions.
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Nights with President Schmidt Continue July 25
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 25, 2024 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM - Arch students from the School of Engineering and the Lally School of Management are invited to join President Schmidt at his home, alongside faculty, staff, and alumni, for an excellent opportunity for students to network and have meaningful conversations about their Arch summer semester and plans for their semester away. Please RSVP by July 12 via Handshake; space is limited and available on a first-come, first-served basis.
item.author: Students

item.title: NSF ERC Proposal Planning Workshop Scheduled for July 12
item.description:
Date: Friday, July 12, 2024 2:30 PM - 4:00 PM - NSF has recently released the NSF 24-576 solicitation for Gen-4 Engineering Research Centers. To explore proposal submissions from the RPI research community, Rensselaer’s Office for Research and School of Engineering invite you to register for this NSF ERC proposal planning workshop.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
